channel.description: Recent content in Python on My Tech Blog

item.title: TechNewsLetter Vol:18
item.description:
Hi Guys,

Here is your weekly quota of some interesting links

Security:

  • Lloyds bank hit by DDoS attack

  • SMS vulnerabilities in Samsung Galaxy phones

  • Microsoft Remote Desktop Client for Mac Remote Code Execution

  • Stored XSS-ing Millions Of Sites Through HTML Comment Box

  • PHP Melody 2.7 - Multiple Vulnerabilities

  • 0 day writeup: XXE in uber.com

  • Harmful prefetch on Intel

  • Setting a Baseline for Web Security Controls

  • Systemd v228 local root exploit

  • Deobfuscating libMobileGestalt keys

Docker:

  • Meet Minio, an S3 server you can self-host

  • CPU Management In Docker 1.13

  • Deploy Docker Compose Services to Swarm

  • Guide to Fault Tolerant and Load Balanced AWS Docker Deployment on ECS

  • Docker for Automating Honeypots or Malware Sandboxes

  • Containers from Scratch

  • Making docker-in-docker builds x2 faster using Docker ‚Äúcache-from‚Äù option

  • Containerize Everything

  • Docker Networking Demos

  • Enabling Data Science Agility with Docker

  • Using Docker Stack And Compose YAML Files To Deploy Swarm Services

Kubernetes:

  • The Canonical Distribution Of Kubernetes

  • How to collect and graph Kubernetes metrics

  • Using Signal Sciences with Kubernetes

  • What we learned migrating our Jenkins-based Continuous Delivery pipeline to Kubernetes

  • Serverless Framework for Kubernetes

  • Kubernetes Setup for Prometheus and Grafana

  • Container Management Trends: Kubernetes moves out of testing and into production

  • SWARM VS. KUBERNETES VS. MESOS: Which Container tools is best?

  • Hands on Kubernetes (Part 1)

Python:

  • Dismissing Python Garbage Collection at Instagram

  • Exports systemd logs to an external service, eg cloudwatch, elasticsearch

  • Hide screen when boss is approaching

  • Machine learning in Python with scikit-learn

  • Awesome article breaking down wait time and various other stat for NYC Subways

  • Tracking Down a Freaky Python Memory Leak

  • Playing with 80 Million Amazon Product Review Ratings Using Apache Spark

  • Understanding the underscore( _ ) of Python

  • An open source virtual assistant

Golang:

  • Making the move from Scala to Go, and why we‚Äôre not going back

  • Building efficient micro services in Go

  • A Virtual Brainfuck Machine In Go

  • Go vs. Swift: The Languages of The Modern Tech Giants

  • gitql: An SQL-Based Git Repository Querying Tool

Cool projects:

  • Invite friends to SSH into your laptop using their Github handle

  • Web tool for database management and conversion

  • Upload images on imgur

  • Remarkable - The Markdown Editor for Linux

That’s all for now, Enjoy üòÉ üòÉ üòÉ
